attributes.action: Require the home secretary to resign immediately following the police pay scandal !
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The home secretary has now showed total contempt for english and welsh police officers by reducing the pay award to less than 2%, which is effectively a pay cut. She should be removed and he pay award backdated before the police ask for he right to strike, which could have catastrophic consequences !!

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
